snippet.title: Artifice: War Tactics - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description: Artifice: War Tactics is a turn-based strategy game set in a medieval fantasy developed by Silvine Game Studios. The game tasks players with observing enemy positions, anticipate their next move and set attack zones to trigger a chain reaction of combos to land as many hits on enemies as possible. Survive wave after wave of relentless foes, conquer strongholds, and seize treasure. Artifice: War Tactics is launching in 2023 with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest for PC.
